lenders.name: Rajvee & Peter
lenders.loan_because:
Everyone on Earth is related. Humans are dependent on our one planet, Earth. We need to work together to achieve bigger goals. Communities can be built through these businesses.

A human being has a wide range of potentials and life possibilities. If we want to live in peace and protect the earth for the future we need to recognize that human desperation is a threat to all of humanity. We should try to build a world where humans do not have to live in desperate situations because the power of the human mind and collective effort can sustain the whole world's population.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I lived in Ecuador for two months which changed my whole perspective on life.  If I can give $25 to help change someone's life there, then that is money well spent.

lenders.name: Kari
lenders.occupation: Retired - mother of three, grandmother of five

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: I want to change the world :)

lenders.name: The Nootenboom Family
lenders.occupation: Compliance Consultant, Rx Tech, Elem. Students
lenders.loan_because: This is an educational opportunity for our children to learn about helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: Shai - focusing on 7th grade studies, aspires to attend NYU or Stanford (today at least). Jamie - 5th grade gymnast.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: Matthew 25:40
lenders.occupational_info: I run a  large, all volunteer, food pantry. We provide groceries with recipes for complete meals to the needy. We also offer information regarding the many other sources of assistance available for individual needs. Our goal is, to help people help themselves and  get back on their feet. We make free Bibles, Christian literature, and sermon tapes  available to all. Our ministry is solely church supported.

lenders.name: Tanner & Maddie
lenders.loan_because: The little we donate can help change someones live.  "A little can do a lot"
lenders.occupational_info: Custom Vinyl Lettering & Designs to help advertise businesses

lenders.name: Micaela
lenders.loan_because: I beleive you need a chance in order to have success in whatever you do.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a small Dog Grooming business in Houston, Tx.

lenders.name: Preston
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: I can...because changing the world happens in small, but collective steps...because we are global citizens with the power to help each other...because I am inspired by the developers of this website and the individual entrepreneurs it represents...because it feels good.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach "Women's Studies" at university.  Through this work I like to think I empower my students while also encouraging them to consider their own privilege and responsibilities as global citizens.

lenders.name: Sepehr
lenders.loan_because: Coming from a third world country, I know how lucky I am to be in America.  Plus, I know the money can benefit the recipient more than me. =D

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: life is all about helping each other

lenders.name: Mindy
lenders.loan_because:
Those who give love gather love, and
I love to help those in need.

lenders.name: Bridgette
lenders.loan_because: The Lord loves a cheerful giver.  I hope and pray that my son, Robert, will never have a need, such as food and shelter, but if he ever does, I pray that my kindness to others will cause blessings to fall on him and someone will be kind to him.
lenders.occupational_info: For the past 5 years I have been involved with the Shashamane Foundation, a 501(c)3 non-profit organization.  We have built a school in Ethiopia that now houses 600 students.  Each year we put on a fashion show to raise money to assist the school.  We have also created a magazine called AFAR, which I am the creative designer and editor.  The magazine sales help to fund the school in Africa.

lenders.name: Ateeya
lenders.loan_because: it reminds me that one person can make a difference
lenders.occupational_info: I provide businesses with  risk management advice and insurance product placement

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I lead a very privileged life compared to much of the world and I want to help other people who are trying to make a decent life for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired high school teacher and I am now working as a real estate assistant.

lenders.name: Isaac
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed with the ability to earn a good living.  If i'm able to give someone a chance to better themselves then i will.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an IT Consultant.  I configure and maintain Computer Networks for a wide variety of companies.

lenders.name: Lori
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people in the agricultural industry around the world. Everyone deserves a chance to help themselves and their families prosper.
lenders.occupational_info: I help cattle producers in Alberta, Canada to do better in their businesses.

lenders.name: Suzanne,Carol and Gloria
lenders.loan_because: I had recently watched a documentary on micro loans and I was so impresssed at what these organizations were doing but I didn't know how to donate to one.  Then one day my girls and myself were watching the Oprah show and found out about Kiva, we immediately went to the web site to find someone to help.  My girls are so excited about the idea of doing the important job of helping someone feed their family my oldest has a birthday coming up and she donated her birthday money to Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: Students and a teacher

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back. As a person who started his own business I understand the importance of funding/risk model. We all ha ve our dreams and we need partners to accomplish them.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a consulting company. We specialize in helping high tech firms grow there business  thru, building, fixing, coaching and providing winning sales strategies for Sales Teams.

lenders.name: Joachim
lenders.loan_because: It's a good thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I help build the Internet.

lenders.name: On the Farm Vegetables
lenders.loan_because: We can.

lenders.name: Ramona and Ruwan
lenders.loan_because: We believe that this is one of the best ways to alleviate poverty and change the world - one family at a time.

lenders.name: Eddie
lenders.loan_because: I believe that we can all make a difference in the life of someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I deal with a variety of people and work for a company that believes in taking care of the world as well as in the value in helping others.

lenders.name: Jane
lenders.loan_because: I want to assist in the areas devastated by US policies
lenders.occupational_info: Even though I have retired, I continue to work part-time.  I web enable curriculum for migrant high school students

lenders.name: Jeanne (Amenlady)
lenders.loan_because: Jesus said to give... "Freely you have received, freely give."  I am so thankful for this excellent idea to help people whom are working to make their own lives better, often in places where that is difficult.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a wife for 36 years, mother of 5 childen, grandmother to 11. I have worked various jobs including customer service, Hair cutting and medical dispatcher for emergency medical heart teams. Currently I just serve my family at home and serve the Lord Jesus Christ through my church.

lenders.name: Jen

lenders.occupational_info: I make sure that the people's bills are correct, help them with questions about their bills, and make sure they pay them.

lenders.loan_because: its a blessing to share

lenders.name: V.T.
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people become self-sufficient.   This program focuses on the proverbial act of teaching people to fish, rather than serving them a meal.
lenders.occupational_info: Lead the Americas division of a large, global corporation.

lenders.name: Devlin
lenders.loan_because: It is a great way to help people get on their feet in a developing country.

lenders.name: Mahesh
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed in this world and want to be able to give back and help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of computers at a local university

lenders.occupational_info: I help people buy, sell or rent homes.

lenders.name: Isa
lenders.loan_because: at some point, someone stood up for me. I could never pay them back, so I will pay it forward.
lenders.occupational_info:
I  train people to use computers and create web sites.

Join Our Team:

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I belileve that individuals are the keys to their own success.
lenders.occupational_info: Work in technology and volunteer to organizations in my community.

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: I know how difficult it can be to start and run a business.  I hope that my success can help others around the world achieve the same satisfaction I feel at a job well done.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I wanted to make a loan after I saw Oprah's program about giving.  I am a big believer in giving to developing countries.  In the U.S. we have so much more, and we can give a little to help others "learn how to fish".  I like giving to people who are willing to work hard.  I especially was interested in loaning to someone in Ecuador because I lived in Quito for a year.  I remember flying into Guayaquil on the way to visit the Galapogas Islands.  I want to contine to make loans every month.
lenders.occupational_info:
I teach seven-eight year olds.  We focus mostly on reading and math.
I've been teaching for 25 years and I love it.

lenders.name: Sandi
lenders.loan_because: I beleive if everyone gave just what they could afford this entire world would be a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired but I am part owner and investor in a business my son runs.  It is the limo business.  We have 4 limos 2 are racing themed.  We are doing so well and just want to help someone get started in their own business.

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me in so many ways.

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.occupational_info: commercial real estate

lenders.name: Victoria
lenders.loan_because: I can and I want to teach my daughter that there are better, unselfish ways to treat people in our vast world.

lenders.name: wendy
lenders.loan_because: I am a small business owner and have been blessed with the resources and opportunities to make my own life better and want to give others those same opportunities.

lenders.name: Maggie
lenders.loan_because: I think it is an awesome idea that such a small thing for me means such a great thing for someone else!
lenders.occupational_info: I am an assistant manager for a big box retailer. I manage our apparel, home decor, and home "essentials" departments.

lenders.occupational_info: I work on the computer all day long communicating with people all over the world.

lenders.occupational_info: I work in an office helping my company to develop new scientific technology the help improve the world.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to do so.

lenders.name: Sean
lenders.loan_because: The Golden Rule. Kant's categorical imperative. Rawls's original position. Kongzi and Mengzi's notion of ren. Mill's utility or happiness maximization principle. WWJD?: Jane (Austen) would do Kiva. People ought to help one another, especially when the burden is so small. In my 6 years on Kiva, I have made over 130 loans, and have lost perhaps about $2. Kiva is amazing.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a singer-songwriter, writer, and philosopher

lenders.occupational_info: I help take care of elders in a long term care home who have health concerns that pevent them or their families from caring for themselves.

lenders.name: Ann

lenders.occupational_info: I help people find a home to buy and I help people find someone to buy their home when they need to sell it.

lenders.occupation: Mom, Fiber Artist, Int'l Development Consultant

lenders.occupational_info:
I care and raise my 2 years old son, Nicolas. I used to work in international development before becoming a Mom, and know first hand the importance and impact that microfinance can have for a small entrepreneur.
I am also a fiber artist, a yogini, an amateur web designer and a freelance photographer.

lenders.name: Wil
lenders.loan_because: It makes you feel good.

lenders.name: Jeff & Mary
lenders.loan_because: "Give me a fish and I eat for a day. Teach me to fish and I eat for a lifetime.”

lives and encourage them to be financially stable.

very rewarding,i help elderly people
stay in there own homes as long as possible.

lenders.occupational_info: I am a first grade teacher.

lenders.name: Larry & Carol

lenders.occupational_info: Enjoying early retirement from a sales, marketing, and training career.

lenders.name: Carrie
lenders.loan_because: we all have a little to give
lenders.occupational_info: I work with the elderly to get them strong and independent again.

lenders.name: Shannon
lenders.loan_because: I know what it's like to start my own business from the ground up.  I am grateful for all the small loans I received while getting it off the ground.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Virtual Assistant.  I help other business owners with administrative tasks so that they can focus on their business needs.

lenders.name: QANTA
lenders.loan_because: Thanks to God, I have more than I need...
lenders.occupational_info: I look after people when they are sick. I teach other doctors to do the same.

lenders.name: Retta
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of giving.
lenders.occupational_info: I manufacturer cosmetics.  I sell wholesale and retail.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: I have often said that I would love to be wealthy for the opportunity to feel like I am really making a difference on a grand scale... well I'm still not wealthy.  And as a public school teacher with a husband in graduate school I probably never will be.  But Kiva makes it easy for me to feel I can truly have an international impact.  I am increasingly impressed with the initiative of global minded philanthropists harnessing the power of technology!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm the mother of a toddler daughter and a full time public school teacher.  I teach Environmental Science and World History to 9-12th grade students that have learning, emotional and physical disabilities that make education extra challenging for them.  While most of my kids come from disadvantaged backgrounds, I'm using Kiva as a tool in the classroom to teach them the importance of perspective and a global conscience.  My classes will raise money and select Kiva loans to donate to!

lenders.name: KellyTirman
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a positive impact on the world and consider providing loans via Kiva part of that effort. I value the entrepreneurial sprint, ambition and drive that I see represented in the individuals on this site and want to do want I can to help them succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in Global eCommerce.

lenders.name: Po ka. Dot
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of helping someone becoming independent.

lenders.name: Ali
lenders.loan_because: I want to help woman in the third world countries become independent and part of the economic cycle and be able to earn a living on their own.

lenders.name: Troy
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate for what I have and am thankful everyday to be able to work in a field I enjoy.  I would like others to have the same fulfillment.

lenders.name: Max Prescott
lenders.loan_because: The world is a place that could use my help when I can.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: the world is like a big pond, and the ripples of success in one part of the world affect us all.
lenders.occupational_info: I help my clients to communicate better with their customers.

lenders.name: Kathie
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful for the opportunities I have recieved in life, and want to be a demonstration of God's love to others.
lenders.occupational_info: i try to help sick people get better.

lenders.loan_because: For the price of a few weeks' worth of lattes I can make a real impact on someone's future.

lenders.occupational_info: I spent 36 years educating young children in an economically impoverished area of San Diego, Ca.  I want to see a child with needs grow up an be a proud, independent worker.

It also teachers our children about the reality of the world and how we have so much more than what we need.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with nonprofit groups in recreation and culture to ensure sustainability of the groups in our community.

lenders.name: Brenda

lenders.loan_because: I want to share my resources if I can - we are all in this together - our family, our sisters and brothers...

 Thank You Kiva!!

lenders.name: Ryan Allen
lenders.loan_because: I am hoping that I can make a difference in someones life.  It does not take much to help and it's easy to do.  And you can do it from home.  God bless Kiva for giving me the chance to help someone far less fortunate than me.

lenders.name: Geneva
lenders.loan_because: It is a good way to give back to the world.

lenders.name: Kevin & Maurene
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people who are trying to improve their lives.

lenders.occupational_info: I love to take action pictures of children and animals.

lenders.name: Karron
lenders.loan_because: I care.  I want people to have every opportunity available to make a living and provide for their families.  There are no limitations when you have a dream and I wish the best to all who pursue their dreams!

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: I love this idea.  I've been looking for a way to give in a way that could really make a difference.  What a wonderful way for anyone and everyone to improve a life.  God Bless!

lenders.loan_because: I can and feel I should.

lenders.occupational_info: I work with children in a hospital,and I feel very lucky that everyday I get to go to work to do what I love.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: It is such a wonderful feeling knowing that I can give someone a helping hand in life. As a loan is repaid I can reach out to another person in need.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: The imbalance between rich and poor is frightening to me.  Even if as an individual I do not fall into a category that most Americans would call "rich" what we collectively enjoy here in the USA is so much more that most people have around the world.  I have seen what real poverty is and what it does to families. If I can be a small part of helping to stop it, I will.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach the art, music and culture of West Africa to American college students, and I work with living artists from the African continent, both in the US and abroad, to advance their careers and their access to skills that they require.  I also work with an elementary school in Keur Momar Sarr and a Nursery school in Louga, both in Senegal, to help provide educational resources and supplies for their students.  This picture is of me and my friend, Khady, a professional dancer in Dakar, Senegal.

lenders.name: Lorna
lenders.loan_because: I can and I hope it will make a difference in someone's life.

lenders.name: Ximena
lenders.loan_because: I want to help improve the lives of people truly in need, and  I believe a little help can make a BIG difference.

lenders.name: Karolina
lenders.loan_because: helping one person makes a difference.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people improve their livelyhoods.
lenders.occupational_info: It is hard work but it is satisfying when I complete a job and that people trust me in their homes.

lenders.loan_because: I like making a difference.

lenders.name: Vinnie

lenders.name: Darren
lenders.loan_because:
I have always believed that you get out of life what you put into it. Each day I try to affect change with something as simple as a “Good Morning” to a passing stranger.  What I like about Kiva is that it gives me the opportunity to help someone somewhere else in the world to affect change in their lives and those around them.

At times our own light goes out and is rekindled by a spark from another person. Each of us has cause to think with deep gratitude of those who have lighted the flame within us. Albert Schweitzer

lenders.name: Valarie
lenders.loan_because: My "little extra" could be the difference between someone making it or not making it.  Helping someone help themselves -- great.
lenders.occupational_info: I help senior citizens who can't afford the community services such as meals, prescription medicines as well as talk to those who are just sad or don't know where to turn.

lenders.name: morgahn

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: I believe in karma!

lenders.name: Tee
lenders.loan_because: At the end of the day, all we have is each other.

lenders.occupational_info: I help my clients in finding their dream home,find a suitable purchaser for their home. I feel happy when my clients are happy

lenders.occupational_info:

lenders.occupational_info: Chris helps companies use computer software to make their businesses run more smoothly. Kate is an expert in advertising and marketing. Our most important job is as parents.

lenders.loan_because: I know what it is like to start a business and need someone to believe in you enough to help you wih the money to get going. I want to pass it on!!

lenders.loan_because: I know what it's like to have a little, but still want the best for you and your family.  Everyone needs a helping hand at some point in their lives and I want to give back in a way that I know will do someone some good.

lenders.loan_because: I can. For the cost of one night out, I can help to vastly improve someone else's life. Why wouldn't I want to do this?
lenders.occupational_info: I trim horse's feet keeping them sound and healthy.

lenders.name: Lauren
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.

lenders.loan_because: I love helping people. I have made a career of it and I think I can contribute to this wonderful idea.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of patients after they have surgery on the bones in the body. I work at a world renowed hospital in Boston, Massachusetts

lenders.loan_because: I want to help individuals who are trying to succeed. The things that we spend 25.00 on are so less valuable that what it can do for others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently in my second year of college. I am studying Interior Design, and one day hope to start my own furniture/textile design company.

lenders.name: Joel
lenders.loan_because: lending helps open the petals of the flower of our full human potential. (I just made that up all by myself.)
lenders.occupational_info: I help old ladies find a place to sit. I make strange environments seem comfortable.  I answer questions about foreign countries, schedules and the weather. I try to make sick people feel better.I am prepared to save lives, if necessary.  And I serve a lot of coffee.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs an opportunity...a chance....I want to give them that chance, however small.

lenders.loan_because: its the little things that matter...

lenders.name: Jeneva
lenders.loan_because: People have helped me get my business going, so this is a way to pay it forward.

lenders.name: Shaun & Monica
lenders.loan_because: It allows me to help other people I would never be able to meet.
lenders.occupational_info: I repair and service Honda cars and trucks.

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: We all have the capacity to give and to help others in need and I would like to make a difference in someone elses life.
lenders.occupational_info: I purchase production materials, supplies, spare parts, etc. for use in our factory.

lenders.name: Marie
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate to live in America.  I came to this country from Jamaica when I was 5 years old.  I believe that we are all here to help enrich the lives of others in anyway we can.
lenders.occupational_info: I take calls from people who need technical help with their computer.

lenders.name: Yvonne
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping others.   I've been very blessed in my life.  My success and acheivements would not be possible if it wasn't for the help and support of family and friends.  We all are here to help one another.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a pharmaceutical company.  I manage the doctor office's that run our clinical trials.  Trials are conducted on groups of people before the FDA approves the drug to be sold on the market to ensure that they are safe to use.

lenders.name: Shadab
lenders.loan_because: I want to help
lenders.occupational_info: Help heal

lenders.name: Claudia
lenders.loan_because: I was a single mother and struggled throughout my life to support my daughter and myself. I lost my father at the age of 7, my mother at the age of 18. I never gave up inspite of it all. I worked hard, put myself through college, graduating after 19 years of working at it - the same year my daughter graduated from college. I loan because I know the struggle. But I also know the rewards because of hard work, determination, drive, passion, caring.
lenders.occupational_info: I started my own business in 2005 doing accounting for various companies that need only a few hours per week, or month, and don't need  a bookkeeper or accounting full-time. I left a full-time position not knowing whether this would work or not to sustain me. I  now have 13 clients that are very diverse in their businesses.  Some have come and gone but there always seems to be another that comes my way. It is the most rewarding work I have done in this field in over 35 years of accounting.

lenders.name: Brian Kodra
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping those who would like to work hard for themselves to provide a better life for their families.

lenders.name: Cindy
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: 25 dollars really make a difference in someone's life

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because: You can help the world around you more by opening your hand than closing your fist. I know that with the little I have I can help someone who has even less and that makes the circle.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Registered Nurse caring for the uninsured and underinsured who are unable to access healthcare

lenders.name: lenchi and margo
lenders.loan_because: my wife margo and i would like to help pepole realize their dreams
lenders.occupational_info: i work making people feel beautiful ,my wife , margo gives me inspiration and strengh.

lenders.name: Constance
lenders.loan_because: I know I can make a difference, especially to women who want to make their lives better for themselves and their children.
lenders.occupational_info: I design books, pamphlets, newsletters and other printed materials. I also design logos for businesses. I am a published writer and am working on a novel.

lenders.occupation: Behavior Specialist with Special Needs Children

lenders.name: Darshana
lenders.occupation: Crisis, Conflict, Relationship Coach and Healer

lenders.name: Cindy

lenders.occupational_info: I work in the correctional system assisting individuals to transition back into the community.

lenders.name: Trisha
lenders.loan_because: I want to be part of the solution
lenders.occupational_info: small animal emergency medicine

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I think everyone should be given a chance to live out their dreams and doing something nice for someone will hopefully lead to them doing something nice for someone else as they are able.

lenders.name: Ron
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should have the opportunity to succeed in life, no matter how large or small the business.
lenders.occupational_info: I help protect our environment and the water and air we drink and breathe.

lenders.name: Aire Libre Publishing
lenders.loan_because: Charity is the soul's way of extending itself.
lenders.occupational_info:
Aire Libre Publishing & Computing Ltd. is a privately owned   corporation, dedicated to advance knowledge, Self Realization and evolving of the Human mind and heart.
Our latest is a booklet about: Every Human-Being's Life is based on a strong foundation. 
We identify 7 Pillars as the major points of strength.

The Essential Companion is your key to these 7 Pillars and understanding them. 
It also gives you 7 Tools to use in your life, 
so you may consciously rely upon the 7 Pillars with ease, Read More on http://theessentialcompanion.com

lenders.occupational_info: I work  as a hair stylist and have been doing this type of work for 20 yrs now.

lenders.name: Laurie
lenders.loan_because: I have enough money and would like to share some of it helping people live their dreams and have a better life
lenders.occupational_info: I am a hospice nurse. I take care of people who are dying.

lenders.name: Laura W
lenders.loan_because: I believe that if we all work together we can make a difference in this world.
lenders.occupational_info: Self Employed

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: Kudos to Kiva for providing a mechanism for people to make meaningful change in the world!
lenders.occupational_info: I help educational institutions, government agencies, and other organizations develop, design, and implement e-learning programs and materials. e-Learning is also known as distance education or online learning.

lenders.name: Kristen
lenders.loan_because:
"We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give."

Winston Churchill
lenders.occupational_info: I am a full time mother.  I work part time from home on special projects for my company.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: If you're in a position to do so, why not help others to have a better life?

lenders.name: George
lenders.loan_because: Because there are those in need.  Because there are those who believe. Because we all can make a difference, $25 (or more!!!) at a time.

lenders.name: Stella and Mike
lenders.loan_because: It's an easy way for us to help someone else out.

lenders.name: Bertina
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people get ahead, I still believe that there is good in this world, WE need to magnify.
lenders.occupational_info: I write loans for people to buy homes and business' to buy buildings, I also help small business owners get started.
